metadata.title: CVE-2021-22243 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Under specialized conditions, GitLab CE/EE versions starting 7.10 may allowexisting GitLab users to use an invite URL meant for another email addressto gain access into a group.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
